name: Tekken X Street Fighter
description:
Tekken X Street Fighter is an arcade-fighting game developed by Capcom and Bandai Namco Entertainment.
You can play Tekken X Street Fighter on Xbox One and PlayStation 4.
It was produced by Katsuhiro Harada. It was scored by Akitaka Tohyama, Keiichi Okabe and Nobuyoshi Sano.
